Pinyin1: wǒmen míngtiān yīqǐ qù kàn diànyǐngbā 。
Chinese1: 我们明天一起去看电影吧。
Translate1: Let's go watch a movie together tomorrow.

Pinyin1: zhège wèntí wǒ bù tài qīngchu 。
Chinese1: 这个问题我不太清楚。
Translate1: I'm not quite sure about this question.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ děng yīhuìr 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这里等一会儿。
Translate1: We can wait here for a while.

Pinyin1: tā de zhōngwén shuō dé fēicháng liúlì 。
Chinese1: 他的中文说得非常流利。
Translate1: He speaks Chinese very fluently.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào gēng duō de shíjiān lái zhǔnbèi 。
Chinese1: 我们需要更多的时间来准备。
Translate1: We need more time to prepare.

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng fēichángshìhé pāizhào 。
Chinese1: 这个地方非常适合拍照。
Translate1: This place is perfect for taking photos.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhèjiā cāntīng chīwǎnfàn 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这家餐厅吃晚饭。
Translate1: We can have dinner at this restaurant.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi jìnkuài jiějué zhège wèntí 。
Chinese1: 我们应该尽快解决这个问题。
Translate1: We should solve this problem as soon as possible.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ xiūxi yīxià 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这里休息一下。
Translate1: We can take a rest here for a while.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhège gōngyuán sànbù 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这个公园散步。
Translate1: We can take a walk in this park.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi jìnliàngbìmiǎn làngfèishíjiān 。
Chinese1: 我们应该尽量避免浪费时间。
Translate1: We should try to avoid wasting time.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhège shāngchǎng gòuwù 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这个商场购物。
Translate1: We can go shopping at this mall.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xūyào gēng duō de rénlái bāngzhù wǒmen 。
Chinese1: 我们需要更多的人来帮助我们。
Translate1: We need more people to help us.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhège kāfēiguǎn hēkāfēi 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这个咖啡馆喝咖啡。
Translate1: We can have coffee at this café.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīnggāi jìnliàngjiǎnshǎo làngfèizīyuán 。
Chinese1: 我们应该尽量减少浪费资源。
Translate1: We should try to minimize resource waste.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhège bówùguǎn cānguān zhǎn 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这个博物馆参观展。
Translate1: We can visit exhibitions at this museum.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zài zhège yóulèchǎng wányóuxì 。
Chinese1: 我们可以在这个游乐场玩游戏。
Translate1: We can play games at this amusement park.

Pinyin1: wǒ měitiān zǎoshang dōu hēyībēi kāfēi 。
Chinese1: 我每天早上都喝一杯咖啡。
Translate1: I drink a cup of coffee every morning.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gōngsī yǒu hěnduō wàiguó yuángōng 。
Chinese1: 我们公司有很多外国员工。
Translate1: There are many foreign employees in our company.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan zài zhōumò qù guàngjiē gòuwù 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢在周末去逛街购物。
Translate1: I like to go shopping on weekends.

Pinyin1: wǒmen jiāyǒu liǎngzhī kěài de māomī 。
Chinese1: 我们家有两只可爱的猫咪。
Translate1: We have two cute cats at home.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de tuánduì hézuò fēicháng mòqì 。
Chinese1: 我们的团队合作非常默契。
Translate1: Our team works together very well.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de gōngsī tígōng hěnduō péixùn jīhuì 。
Chinese1: 我们的公司提供很多培训机会。
Translate1: Our company provides many training opportunities.

Pinyin1: wǒmen měitiān dōuyào xuéxí xīn zhīshi 。
Chinese1: 我们每天都要学习新知识。
Translate1: We have to learn new knowledge every day.

Pinyin1: tā de hànyǔ shuō dé fēicháng liúlì 。
Chinese1: 他的汉语说得非常流利。
Translate1: He speaks Chinese very fluently.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ yīqǐ qù kàn diànyǐng 。
Chinese1: 我们可以一起去看电影。
Translate1: We can go to the movies together.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de gōngsī zhèngzài kuòdà yèwù 。
Chinese1: 我们的公司正在扩大业务。
Translate1: Our company is expanding its business.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de tuánduì hézuò dé fēicháng hǎo 。
Chinese1: 我们的团队合作得非常好。
Translate1: Our team works very well together.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de wèilái chōngmǎnxīwàng hé jīyù 。
Chinese1: 我们的未来充满希望和机遇。
Translate1: Our future is full of hope and opportunities.

Pinyin1: wǒ měitiān zǎoshang liùdiǎn qǐchuáng 。
Chinese1: 我每天早上六点起床。
Translate1: I wake up at 6 am every morning.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan kàn diànyǐng hé tīng yīnyuè 。
Chinese1: 他喜欢看电影和听音乐。
Translate1: He likes watching movies and listening to music.

Pinyin1: tā zài gōngsī gōngzuò yǐjīng liǎngnián le 。
Chinese1: 她在公司工作已经两年了。
Translate1: She has been working at the company for two years.

Pinyin1: wǒmen míngtiān yào qù lǚyóu 。
Chinese1: 我们明天要去旅游。
Translate1: We are going on a trip tomorrow.

Pinyin1: tā de zhōngwén shuō dé fēicháng liúlì 。
Chinese1: 他的中文说得非常流利。
Translate1: He speaks Chinese very fluently.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan chī là de shíwù 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢吃辣的食物。
Translate1: She likes spicy food.

Pinyin1: wǒmen měige yuè dōu yào jiāo fángzū 。
Chinese1: 我们每个月都要交房租。
Translate1: We have to pay rent every month.

Pinyin1: tā zhèngzài xuéxí hànyǔ 。
Chinese1: 他正在学习汉语。
Translate1: He is learning Chinese.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōuzhù zài guówài 。
Chinese1: 她的家人都住在国外。
Translate1: Her family all live abroad.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan zài zhōumò qù páshān 。
Chinese1: 我们喜欢在周末去爬山。
Translate1: We like to go hiking on weekends.

Pinyin1: tā de gōngzuò hěn máng ， jīngcháng jiābān 。
Chinese1: 他的工作很忙，经常加班。
Translate1: is job is very busy and he often works overtime.

Pinyin1: tā de àihào shì huàhuà hé chànggē 。
Chinese1: 她的爱好是画画和唱歌。
Translate1: Her hobbies are painting and singing.

Pinyin1: wǒmen měitiān dōuyào zuò jiāwù 。
Chinese1: 我们每天都要做家务。
Translate1: We have to do housework every day.

Pinyin1: tā de shēngrì shì zài shíyuèfèn 。
Chinese1: 他的生日是在十月份。
Translate1: His birthday is in October.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan chuān piàoliang de yīfú 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢穿漂亮的衣服。
Translate1: She likes to wear pretty clothes.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de gōngsī zài shìzhōngxīn 。
Chinese1: 我们的公司在市中心。
Translate1: Our company is in the city center.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōu hěn zhīchí tā de gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 他的家人都很支持他的工作。
Translate1: His family all support his work.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào duànliànshēntǐ 。
Chinese1: 她每天都要锻炼身体。
Translate1: She exercises every day.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan qù hǎibiān dùjià 。
Chinese1: 我们喜欢去海边度假。
Translate1: We like to go on vacation by the sea.

Pinyin1: tā de mèngxiǎng shì chéngwéi yīmíng yīnyuèjiā 。
Chinese1: 他的梦想是成为一名音乐家。
Translate1: His dream is to become a musician.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan kàndiànshì hé wányóuxì 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢看电视和玩游戏。
Translate1: I like watching TV and playing games.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào hēkāfēi 。
Chinese1: 他每天都要喝咖啡。
Translate1: He drinks coffee every day.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōu hěn yǒuhǎo 。
Chinese1: 她的家人都很友好。
Translate1: Her family is very friendly.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de gōngsī hěndà ， yǒu hěnduō yuángōng 。
Chinese1: 我们的公司很大，有很多员工。
Translate1: Our company is big and has many employees.

Pinyin1: tā de zhōngwén kǒuyǔ hěn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 他的中文口语很好。
Translate1: His spoken Chinese is very good.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan chī tiánshí ， bǐrú qiǎokèlì 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢吃甜食，比如巧克力。
Translate1: She likes to eat sweets, such as chocolate.

Pinyin1: wǒmen měige yuè dōu yào huán dàikuǎn 。
Chinese1: 我们每个月都要还贷款。
Translate1: We have to pay off our loans every month.

Pinyin1: tā de àihào shì lǚyóu hé shèyǐng 。
Chinese1: 她的爱好是旅游和摄影。
Translate1: Her hobbies are traveling and photography.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan zài jiālǐ kàn diànyǐng 。
Chinese1: 我们喜欢在家里看电影。
Translate1: We like to watch movies at home.

Pinyin1: tā de gōngzuò hěnlěi ， dànshì hěn yǒu yìyì 。
Chinese1: 他的工作很累，但是很有意义。
Translate1: His job is tiring but meaningful.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào zuòfàn gěi jiārén chī 。
Chinese1: 她每天都要做饭给家人吃。
Translate1: She cooks for her family every day.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōu hěn jiànkāng ， hěnshǎo shēngbìng 。
Chinese1: 他的家人都很健康，很少生病。
Translate1: His family is very healthy and rarely gets sick.

Pinyin1: tā de shēngrì shì zài wǔyuèfèn 。
Chinese1: 他的生日是在五月份。
Translate1: His birthday is in May.

Pinyin1: wǒmen měige zhōumò dōuhuì qù guàngjiē gòuwù 。
Chinese1: 我们每个周末都会去逛街购物。
Translate1: We go shopping every weekend.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan kànshū ， yóuqí shì lìshǐshūjí 。
Chinese1: 他喜欢看书，尤其是历史书籍。
Translate1: He likes to read books, especially history books.

Pinyin1: tā de gōngzuò hěn máng ， jīngcháng jiābān 。
Chinese1: 他的工作很忙，经常加班。
Translate1: His job is very busy and he often works overtime.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan kàn xiǎoshuō hé xiězuò 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢看小说和写作。
Translate1: She likes reading novels and writing.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōu shì yīshēng 。
Chinese1: 他的家人都是医生。
Translate1: His family are all doctors.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào qù jiànshēnfáng duànliàn 。
Chinese1: 她每天都要去健身房锻炼。
Translate1: She goes to the gym to exercise every day.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan chī zhōngcān hé xīcān 。
Chinese1: 我们喜欢吃中餐和西餐。
Translate1: We like to eat Chinese and Western food.

Pinyin1: tā de mèngxiǎng shì chéngwéi yīmíng yǎnyuán 。
Chinese1: 他的梦想是成为一名演员。
Translate1: His dream is to become an actor.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan kàn diànshìjù hé diànyǐng 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢看电视剧和电影。
Translate1: I like to watch TV dramas and movies.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào hēkāfēi 。
Chinese1: 她每天都要喝咖啡。
Translate1: She drinks coffee every day.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de gōngsī yǒu hěnduō yuángōng 。
Chinese1: 我们的公司有很多员工。
Translate1: Our company has many employees.

Pinyin1: tā de àihào shì dǎlánqiú hé yóuyǒng 。
Chinese1: 他的爱好是打篮球和游泳。
Translate1: His hobbies are playing basketball and swimming.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōuzhù zài xiāngxià 。
Chinese1: 她的家人都住在乡下。
Translate1: Her family all live in the countryside.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan zài zhōumò qù guàngjiē 。
Chinese1: 我们喜欢在周末去逛街。
Translate1: We like to go shopping on weekends.

Pinyin1: tā zhèngzài xuéxí yīngyǔ hé fǎyǔ 。
Chinese1: 他正在学习英语和法语。
Translate1: He is learning English and French.

Chinese1: 她的工作很忙，经常加班。
Translate1: Her job is very busy and she often works overtime.

Translate1: We have to pay the mortgage every month.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan chī tiánshí hé shuǐguǒ 。
Chinese1: 她喜欢吃甜食和水果。
Translate1: She likes to eat sweets and fruits.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de xuéxiào zài shìzhōngxīn 。

Translate1: Our school is in the city center.

Pinyin1: tā de jiārén dōu shì jiàoshī 。
Chinese1: 他的家人都是教师。
Translate1: His family are all teachers.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào qù pǎobù duànliàn 。
Chinese1: 她每天都要去跑步锻炼。
Translate1: She goes for a run to exercise every day.

Chinese1: 我们喜欢听音乐和唱歌。
Translate1: We like to listen to music and sing.

Pinyin1: tā de mèngxiǎng shì chéngwéi yīmíng huàjiā 。

Translate1: His dream is to become a painter.

Pinyin1: tā de péngyou dōu shì wàiguórén 。

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan kànshū hé xiězuò 。
Chinese1: 他喜欢看书和写作。
Translate1: He likes to read books and write.

Pinyin1: tā de māo hěn kěài ， xǐhuan wánqiú 。

Translate1: We like to travel on weekends.

Pinyin1: wǒmen xǐhuan zài gōngyuán lǐ sànbù 。

Translate1: We like to take a walk in the park.

Chinese1: 她的朋友都是艺术家。
Translate1: Her friends are all artists.

Pinyin1: tā xǐhuan kàn xiǎoshuō hé xiězuò 。
Chinese1: 他喜欢看小说和写作。
Translate1: He likes reading novels and writing.

Pinyin1: tā de gǒu hěn cōngming ， huì zuò hěnduō huāyàng 。
Chinese1: 她的狗很聪明，会做很多花样。
Translate1: Her dog is very smart and can do many tricks.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de xuéxiào yǒu hěnduō xuésheng 。
Chinese1: 我们的学校有很多学生。
Translate1: Our school has many students.

Pinyin1: tā de fùmǔ dōu shì tuìxiū jiàoshī 。
Chinese1: 他的父母都是退休教师。
Translate1: His parents are retired teachers.

Pinyin1: tā měitiān dōuyào hēchá 。
